Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Longport in 1977...
Injured on 4/26/1978 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/14/1978 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1979...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1983, going 25-7, 2.86 ERA...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
